# pgflow (Workflow Engine for Supabase)

> A workflow engine for Postgres using Supabase queues and background tasks to process jobs in parallel. Simple and built for a great developer experience.

## Documentation Sets

- [Abridged documentation](https://www.pgflow.dev/llms-small.txt): a compact version of the documentation for pgflow (Workflow Engine for Supabase), with non-essential content removed
- [Complete documentation](https://www.pgflow.dev/llms-full.txt): the full documentation for pgflow (Workflow Engine for Supabase)

## Notes

- The complete documentation includes all content from the official documentation
- The content is automatically generated from the same source as the official documentation
